name: ControlHub
headline: Purchasing Software | Procure-to-Pay SaaS
description:
ControlHub automates the Procurement and Accounts Payable process of mid-size companies with intuitive purchasing software and AP solutions.

Key features: Purchase Requests generation, Purchasing Approvals, Purchase Orders (PO), Bill processing and payments, sync with ERPs such as Quickbooks and NetSuite.

## Smarter Procurement with Spending Controls
![Generator PO CotrolHub](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606250622ea3c970d37b573d/66d0f57c11c63080d6fa7d38_1.avif)
### **Spend Management**
A user-friendly procurement process helps companies be proactive by removing bottlenecks and controlling costs.
### **Purchase Requests & Orders**
Speed up procurement cycles with automation.Purchase Requests, Approvals and POs are one click away.
![Graph Purchase Order ControlHub](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606250622ea3c970d37b573d/66d0f57cf32572250082c55c_2.avif)
![Graph ControlHub](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606250622ea3c970d37b573d/66d0f57ce55e97030758b7ac_3.avif)
### **Budget Tracking**
Increase collaboration across departmentswith real-time budget utilization, and controls.
### **Inventory**
Minimize stockouts and over-ordering in a simple, effective way.
![Graph ControlHub](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606250622ea3c970d37b573d/66d0f57d89601782663820a2_4.avif)
![Controlhub Integrations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606250622ea3c970d37b573d/66db7b902d24625a20e97a41_integrations.avif)

### Overview of ControlHub

**ControlHub** is an innovative SaaS company founded in 2020 as part of Y Combinator's W21 batch. Its mission focuses on streamlining the procurement processes for mid-sized businesses through an intuitive procure-to-pay (P2P) software solution. Located in [insert location], the company employs a dedicated team of 22 individuals, with Aaron Epstein serving as Group Partner.

### Key Features

ControlHub is equipped with several powerful features designed to simplify purchasing and accounts payable:

- **Purchase Request Generation**: Easily create requests for orders.
- **Purchasing Approvals**: Streamline the approval process to enhance efficiency.
- **Purchase Orders (PO)**: Automatic creation and management of POs.
- **Bill Processing and Payments**: Manage bills and facilitate payments seamlessly.
- **Integration with ERPs**: Synchronize effortlessly with popular ERP systems like QuickBooks and NetSuite.

### Added Benefits

ControlHub significantly enhances spend management and procurement control while minimizing bottlenecks in the purchasing process. Notable functionalities include real-time budget tracking, supplier integrations, invoice automation, and insights through detailed analytics.

### Industry Focus and Customer Base

ControlHub proudly serves a diverse array of industries, including robotics, drones, automotive, and healthcare, providing tailored solutions to meet unique procurement needs.

### Conclusion

ControlHub stands out as a dynamic solution for more intelligent procurement and spend management. Its user-friendly interface, robust features, and integration capabilities make it an appealing choice for mid-sized companies looking to optimize their purchasing processes. 

You can explore more about their offerings or request a demo at [ControlHub's website](https://controlhub.com/).
